tech_pred_posZ : forall n : nat, 0 < n -> predZ (pos n) = pos (Init.Nat.pred n)
Z_ind : forall P : Z -> Prop, P OZ -> (forall n : nat, P (pos n)) -> (forall n : nat, P (neg n)) -> forall z : Z, P z
Z_rect : forall P : Z -> Type, P OZ -> (forall n : nat, P (pos n)) -> (forall n : nat, P (neg n)) -> forall z : Z, P z
Z_rec : forall P : Z -> Set, P OZ -> (forall n : nat, P (pos n)) -> (forall n : nat, P (neg n)) -> forall z : Z, P z
Z_sind : forall P : Z -> SProp, P OZ -> (forall n : nat, P (pos n)) -> (forall n : nat, P (neg n)) -> forall z : Z, P z
tech_add_pos_neg_posZ : forall n1 n2 : nat, n2 < n1 -> addZ (pos n1) (neg n2) = pos (n1 - S n2)
Nat.pred_succ : forall n : nat, Nat.pred (S n) = n
tech_succ_posOZ : forall n : nat, succZ (posOZ n) = pos n
Nat.shiftl_land : forall a b n : nat, Nat.shiftl (Nat.land a b) n = Nat.land (Nat.shiftl a n) (Nat.shiftl b n)
Pnat.Nat2Pos.id_max : forall n : nat, BinPos.Pos.to_nat (BinPos.Pos.of_nat n) = Init.Nat.max 1 n
Nat.ones_equiv : forall n : nat, Nat.ones n = Nat.pred (2 ^ n)
Nat.shiftr_spec' : forall a n m : nat, Nat.testbit (Nat.shiftr a n) m = Nat.testbit a (m + n)
Nat.succ_pred : forall n : nat, n <> 0 -> S (Nat.pred n) = n
Pnat.Nat2Pos.id : forall n : nat, n <> 0 -> BinPos.Pos.to_nat (BinPos.Pos.of_nat n) = n
Nat.shiftl_spec_high' : forall a n m : nat, n <= m -> Nat.testbit (Nat.shiftl a n) m = Nat.testbit a (m - n)
Nat.lnot_involutive : forall a n : nat, Nat.lnot (Nat.lnot a n) n = a
Nat.lt_succ_pred : forall z n : nat, z < n -> S (Nat.pred n) = n
S_pred : forall n m : nat, m < n -> n = S (Init.Nat.pred n)
Nat.div_pow2_bits : forall a n m : nat, Nat.testbit (a / 2 ^ n) m = Nat.testbit a (m + n)
Nat.add_dichotomy : forall n m : nat, (exists p : nat, p + n = m) \/ (exists p : nat, p + m = n)

tech_add_neg_predZ : forall (x : nat) (y : Z), addZ (neg (S x)) y = predZ (addZ (neg x) y)
addZ_eq5 : forall (n1 : nat) (y : Z), addZ (neg (S n1)) y = predZ (addZ (neg n1) y)
tech_add_pos_succZ : forall (x : nat) (y : Z), addZ (pos (S x)) y = succZ (addZ (pos x) y)
Nat.setbit_spec' : forall a n : nat, Nat.setbit a n = Nat.lor a (2 ^ n)
Nat.ones_spec_high : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> Nat.testbit (Nat.ones n) m = false
addZ_eq4 : forall y : Z, addZ (neg 0) y = predZ y
add_mIZ_predZ : forall x : Z, addZ x (neg 0) = predZ x

unfold addZ. destruct n as [| n'].

Qed.```
